articles.title: Greta Thunberg arrested at pro-Palestinian protest in London
articles.mainIdea: Greta Thunberg arrested at pro-Palestinian protest in London
articles.summary: AFP: Greta Thunberg arrested at pro-Palestinian protest in London. London police on Tuesday arrested Swedish activist Greta Thunberg at a demonstration in support of pro-Palestinian hunger strikers, Palestinian campaign groups said.Thunberg has maintained a high profile in protests supporting Palestinians.

articles.title: 2025 trends: Here are the best industries and cities for US small businesses
articles.mainIdea: 2025 trends: Here are the best industries and cities for US small businesses
articles.summary: Stacker: 2025 trends: Here are the best industries and cities for US small businesses. Bluevine reports 2025 saw a rebound for small businesses, with admin services, education, retail, and health sectors thriving, especially in smaller metros like D.C.

articles.title: DR Congo beat Benin to kick off Cup of Nations bid
articles.mainIdea: DR Congo beat Benin to kick off Cup of Nations bid
articles.summary: AFP: DR Congo beat Benin to kick off Cup of Nations bid. The Democratic Republic of Congo edged out Benin 1-0 in their opening game at the Africa Cup of Nations on Tuesday, with Theo Bongonda scoring the only goal of the Group D clash.One goal proved enough, however, for a DR Congo side backed by the majority of the crowd and who will hope to emerge from a group which also contains 2022 champions Senegal and Botswana -- those teams were due to face off later Tuesday in Tangier.

articles.title: The new economics of packaging
articles.summary: Packaging Gateway: The new economics of packaging. Packaging has moved from a back-end cost to a front-line business decision, reshaping margins, sustainability strategies and competitive advantage across global markets.

articles.title: Former Met chief demands Apple and Google disable stolen phones
articles.mainIdea: Former Met chief demands Apple and Google disable stolen phones
articles.summary: The Telegraph: Former Met chief demands Apple and Google disable stolen phones. A former Metropolitan Police chief has backed plans aimed at forcing Apple and Google to disable stolen smartphones.

articles.title: Outcry follows CBS pulling program on prison key to Trump deportations
articles.mainIdea: Outcry follows CBS pulling program on prison key to Trump deportations
articles.summary: AFP: Outcry follows CBS pulling program on prison key to Trump deportations. The leadership of CBS News was facing accusations of political meddling on Monday over a last-minute decision to not air a report on the notorious Salvadoran prison where US President Donald Trump has sent deported migrants.CBS, which was purchased by the Trump-linked Ellison family earlier this year, said that the prison report needed "additional reporting."
